title: Language defines perception, not fact.
description: @MagsVisaggs explains how gender is a human construct of cultural needs, just like color.
author: MagsVisaggs

These colors are both identifiable as "red," yes? Even though they're different shades, wildly different shades, we recognize them as a single color category
